title: Google App v5.4 Adds An Easier Way To Set Home And Work Locations, Fixes The Card Swipe Animation, And Points To A New Wear App [APK Download + Teardown]
text:
Google App v5.4 Adds An Easier Way To Set Home And Work Locations, Fixes The Card Swipe Animation, And Points To A New Wear App [APK Download + Teardown] 
Published By: AndroidPolice.com - Today 
The Google app was treated to an update late yesterday, bringing the version number up to 5.4. This bump seems to be mostly dedicated to bug...
